entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SerialPort constantly throws IOException #113296
  • Numerics.Vector.SinCos() bug #113295
  • DotnetFuzzing doesn't compile on linux succesfully #113285

Closed

  • API proposal: Stream with BaseStream #31002
  • .NET Core 8 Process StandardIn and Close() Failures #113289
  • Self-assignment instead of delegate creation #111031
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Bounds check for "i + cns < arrlen" bound #112523
  • [API Proposal]: Unicode-aware mode for Regex #113290
  • [wasm] Out of memory exception in System.Xml.XmlWriterApiTests.TCFullEndElement tests #110090
  • [Mono/x64] MutualThdRecur-fptr test crash #102995
    Future
  • how to keep assemblyloadcontext alive after call Unload #113122
  • Brew command passes (now invalid) --no-lock parameter #113276

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Introduce `LclVarDsc::lvIsMultiRegDest` #113294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace `Unsafe.As` with `Unsafe.Read{Write}Unaligned` #113293
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [mono] vector intrinsics fixes #113288
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Switch generic instance cache back to GHashTable; improve ginst hash function #113287
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Support bitwise field insertions for return registers #113178
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Coalesce ifdef blocks #113284
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fixup null annotations from ClaimsPrincipal #113258
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove --no-lock brew flag #113281
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove --no-lock brew flag #113282
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove use of --no-lock with Homebrew. #113277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Switch `optOptimizeLayout` to pre-layout optimization phase #113224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • OSDescription: Returns a user-friendly name instead of kernel info on Android & Apple platforms #113041
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-android, os-ios, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0][browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113271
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Remove experimental args from NodeJS WBT runner #113008
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Refactor `CertFreeCRLContext` #112207
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][infra] Refactor running condition for runtime-ioslike and runtime-llvm pipelines #111967
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Improve wrapper method inliner heuristic #113266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 1: Use templates to specialize gc info encoder/decoder #113223
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Skip inbuild projects in stage2 (built by stage1) #113243
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Remove helper method frames from Monitors #113242
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Include xmmintrin.h early on x86 as well #113279
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Switch simdhash to prime bucket counts; increase load factor #113274
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [APX] Complete EGPR encoding in X64 backend #113237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
